snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Justice | Announcement Trailer | Meta Quest 2 + 3 + Pro
snippet.description:
🩸WISHLIST TODAY: https://ftg.gg/3nSqo3Q 

You are a vampire. You strike from the shadows and drink the blood of both mortal and vampire prey. In a gritty main narrative that includes several side missions and dialogue options, explore a dark and mysterious Venice to improve your abilities and become the ultimate arbiter of justice.

Vampire: The Masquerade - Justice is a single player VR Adventure RPG set in the World of Darkness, coming fall 2023 to Meta Quest 2, 3 & Pro.

Read more about the game at http://www.vtmjustice.com 

Follow the game:
🦇 Twitter - https://twitter.com/VtMJustice 
🦇 Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/VtMJustice 
🦇 Instagram - https://instagram.com/VtMJustice
